snippet: A seven-year legal fight ended between the Justice Department and James Risen of The New York Times over reporting on a botched C.I.A. operation.
abstract: New York Times reporter James Risen will not be called to testify in federal trial of former CIA official Jeffrey Sterling, ending seven-year legal battle in which government repeatedly tried to force Risen to reveal his sources; Sterling is charged with providing classified details about Iran to writer for Risen's 2006 book State of War.
lead_paragraph: A seven-year legal fight ended between the Justice Department and James Risen of The New York Times over reporting on a botched C.I.A. operation.

headline.seo: Legal Fight Ends for James Risen of the New York Times
headline.main: Times Reporter Will Not Be Called to Testify in Leak Case
headline.print_headline: Reporter Wins a 7-Year Fight Not to Testify

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: State of War: The Secret History of the CIA and the Bush Administration (Book)
